description: News about Federal Communications Commission, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Federal Communications Commission
title_page: Federal Communications Commission - The New York Times
maintext:
The Moment That Janet Jackson’s Career Stalled and Justin Timberlake’s Soared
Jackson was vilified after her 2004 Super Bowl halftime show, while Timberlake’s popularity seemed to take off. Our documentary examines how the superstars were treated after their unforgettable wardrobe malfunction.
